name: 100 MONKEYS
description:
100 AI MONKEYS TYPE A NOVELLA

100 monkeys typing rapidly on standard desktop PC
Forget cockroaches that can write novels and pigeons that can ride bicycles — research scientists have just discovered the world’s first ‘MacGyver monkey’ after it chewed its way out of a computer and hid in a cabinet for three months....

Xerox Sutra Editions, 30 page pdf, 2022.

-Bonus animated gif of the 100 monkeys
